mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_type ( title ,created_user, created_time,modified_user, modified_time )VALUES( #{title}, #{createdUser},#{createdTime }, #{modifiedUser},#{modifiedTime} )

INSERT INTO t_information_answer ( iid ,answer, r_answer,created_user, created_time ,modified_user, modified_time )VALUES( #{iid},#{answer},#{rAnswer}, #{createdUser},#{createdTime }, #{modifiedUser},#{modifiedTime} )
mapper.select: SELECT tid,title FROM t_type ORDER BY ASC
SELECT i.type,i.body,a.answer FROM t_information AS i JOIN t_information_answer AS a ON i.iId=a.iId ORDER BY ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_information WHERE tid=#{tId}
SELECT a.r_answer AS rAnswer FROM t_information AS i JOIN t_information_answer AS a ON i.iId=a.iId WHERE i.iid=#{iId}

SELECT iid FROM t_information WHERE body=#{body}
